thread.title: BREAKING: Trump critic Dem @RepAdamSchiff backs DHS electronic ban on Mideast flights
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Trump critic Dem @RepAdamSchiff backs DHS electronic ban on Mideast flights

author: Greg P.
title: BREAKING: Trump critic Dem @RepAdamSchiff backs DHS electronic ban on Mideast flights
text:
BREAKING: Trump critic Dem @RepAdamSchiff backs DHS electronic ban on Mideast flights Posted at 10:02 am on March 21, 2017 by Greg P. 
By now you’ve heard about that DHS ban on electronics on flights to 8 Muslim-majority nations over some sort of terror threat: Electronics ban issued for US-bound flights from 8 Muslim-majority countries pic.twitter.com/lyphTK5RA7 
— FOX & friends (@foxandfriends) March 21, 2017 
Well, the Trump administration just got a huge endorsement of the action from none other than Democrat and major Trump-critic Rep. Adam Schiff: Rep. Schiff says he was briefed by DHS that terrorists still want to ‘bring down aircraft,’ looking for ‘creative ways’ to do it
